task_instruction: Determine whether the following two sentences are paraphrases of each other (yes or no).
input_text:

Sentence 2: In Al-Fallujah , two grenades were thrown Thursday at soldiers from the 3rd Armored Cavalry Regiment , wounding seven , none seriously .
label: yes
